qlearning.domain.exploration

Class RandomExplorationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • qlearning.domain.exploration.RandomExplorationStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExplorationStrategy

    @Immutable
 @ThreadSafe
public class RandomExplorationStrategy
extends Object
implements ExplorationStrategy
    A simple ExplorationStrategy which will choose a random Action some of the time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomExplorationStrategy(ExplorationFactor explorationFactor)
      Create a new RandomExplorationStrategy with the given exploration factor.
      RandomExplorationStrategy(ExplorationFactor explorationFactor, Random random)
      Create a RandomExplorationStrategy that uses the given exploration factor and source of randomness to determine whether or not to explore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExplorationFactor getExplorationFactor()
      Get the exploration factor, which determines how often the agent will choose random gridworld.actions over desirable ones in order to explore the problem space.
      Action getNextAction(SortedSet<StateActionQuality> stateActionQualities)
      Pick the next Action to take.

      • RandomExplorationStrategy

        public RandomExplorationStrategy(ExplorationFactor explorationFactor,
                                 Random random)
        Create a RandomExplorationStrategy that uses the given exploration factor and source of randomness to determine whether or not to explore.
        Parameters:
        explorationFactor - this object's propensity to explore
        random - the source of randomness to make exploration decisions with
